/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. Yellow school buses, a common sight in many Asian countries, are parked along the side of the road, ready to ferry children to and from school. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. In the distance, modern buildings rise, their glass facades reflecting the sunlight, adding a touch of urban sophistication to the otherwise tranquil setting.
